# NWEndpoint.Host.name(_:_:)

**Case**

A host represented as a name.

## Declaration

```swift
case name(String, NWInterface?)
```

## Accessing Host Types

- **NWEndpoint.Host.ipv4(_:)**: A host represented as an IPv4 address.
- **NWEndpoint.Host.ipv6(_:)**: A host represented as an IPv6 address.
